title: People need a chill pill or something
body: I don't know whats going on at the moment, but the levels of salt are insane, I feel the only game mode that people are actually chilled in is ARAM. I think there needs to be a penalty system update, why not? they update everything else. chat restrictions aren't enough, think its time you guys take a page out of another game and do LP queues or ban them for ranked for so many games.
